tooltipText: Erupts the earth at target location, forming a boiling pool of lava that deals $hit:Mage_MagmaField_LingeringHit$ and applies $effect:Status_BurningStat$ at $hit:Mage_MagmaField_LingeringHitBurning$ power every $linger:Mage_MagmaField_LingeringField.tick$ to enemies within the area. Lasts $linger:Mage_MagmaField_LingeringField.duration$
name: Mage_MagmaField
